divs: Sighting DetailsWe were at our home in Thailand. 2 dogs kept barking for 10 to 15 mins. everyhr. 3 did not know, UFO 4 Excited, woke up wife, she said to go out and invitethem in. I said no way. 5fly aroud in front of our home, land on pourch, lift upand land on driveway, stay there for some time, then lift up and fly down thestreet and out of sight.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Soppeung
There was one other sighting in Soppeung on or around October 19th 2000
